title: Can't Download New Client
body:
So I used to have the new client, but something happened and I suddenly had high ping every game, and while trying to solve that problem, I re-installed it, but every time I try to update it, there's a pop-up that says: "League of Legends has encountered a problem. Please re-install League alpha client to try again."

Has anyone even had this problem? Please let me know if you can help, thanks

replies.body:
Ah, this error is quite heckin' annoying! This happens when something went wrong with the first upgrade attempt. Luckily, it's fairly easy to resolve with the following steps. First, you'll want to temporarily disable any Firewall/Antivirus you have running. Next, you'll want to hop into your League install folder (C:\Riot Games\League of Legends) and delete the file named **LeagueClient.exe**. After you've done that, launch League from the **lol.launcher.admin.exe** shortcut as admin (r-click, *run as administrator*) and try the upgrade again.

Let me know if this worked!
Had the same problem and your fix worked thanks!
